Description: The Beacon at Waugh Chapel is located at 1433 S Main Chapel Way, Grambrills, MD 21054 and is managed by PRP Real Estate Management, a reputable property management company with verified listings on http://www.rentcafe.com. The Beacon at Waugh Chapel offers 1 to 3 bedroom apartments ranging in size from 707 to 1217 sqft. Amenities include Business Center, Carpeting, Clubhouse, Fireplace, Dishwasher and more. This rental community is pet friendly, Property is located in the 21054 ZIP code. For more details, contact our office at (410) 721-2760 or use the online contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Description:
(703) 825-0957 - Spacious 3BR/2BA Single Family Home in Odenton, MD! - Spacious 3 bedroom and 2 bath single family home in Odenton, MD close to Ft. Meade and many major commuter routes! This split foyer style home is nestled in a quiet family-friendly neighborhood close to GORC park and several walking trails. Features include spacious eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, ample cabinet storage space and updated appliances. A cozy living room area is great for entertaining and leads to three spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom with tiled tub/shower enclosure. Fully finished basement club room has a second full bath with custom tiled shower and a separate room that would make a great office or hobby room. Enjoy a fully-fenced private backyard and garage/driveway area that allows for plenty of parking and additional storage options. This beautiful home is within the Four Seasons school district and only minutes from the Waugh Chapel Shopping Center which offers lots of entertainment, shopping and dining options! 
Sorry, no pets.
Contact JC at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3539791) Other Amenities - Other- granite countertops, eat-in kitchen, fully equipped kitchen, updated bathroom, basement clubroom, Garage, Yard. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.
